text: Credit card statement shows $29.99 charge on November 21 but I cancelled Prime membership on October 16. Need refund for unauthorized billing.
I see the charge after cancellation date. That's billing error. Processing $89.99 refund to your payment method within 3-5 business days.
Subscribed to Prime Student discount $14.99 annually. Graduated last month. Need to switch to regular Prime membership billing.
Free trial shouldn't charge upfront. That's incorrect billing. I'll refund $29.99 immediately and restart your 30-day trial period correctly.
Enrolled in 30-day free trial on November 7. Got charged $139 immediately instead of after trial period. Trial supposed to be free.
I'll transition your Prime Student membership to regular Prime. Billing cycle adjusts to $14.99 monthly. Benefits remain identical.
Annual Prime membership $89.99 auto-renewed on November 5 without notification. Want to downgrade to monthly $14.99 subscription instead.
